CustomField.description: This is a calculation to determine if the status should be red or green. It is used, along with "Calculate RedGreen Onboarding Status", in the Up-to-date Onboarding Overall Status formula field calculation. It is not on any page layout and it is only available to System Admin. The Up-to-date Onboarding Overall Status formula field is for PEO Web Based Onboarding Record Type.
CustomField.formula:
IF( OR( ISBLANK(Client_Shell_Creation__c)&& Client_Shell_Creation_Target__c=TODAY(), ISBLANK(IPM_Assigned__c)&&IPM_Assigned_Target__c=TODAY(), ISBLANK(Benefits_NCS_Assigned__c)&& Benefits_NCS_Assigned_Target__c=TODAY(), ISBLANK(Payroll_NCS_Assigned__c) && Payroll_NCS_assigned_Target__c=TODAY(), ISBLANK(Onbrdg_Spreadsheet_Rec__c) && Onbrdg_Spreadsheet_Rec_Target__c=TODAY(),
ISBLANK(Load_Holds_Cleared__c)&& Load_Holds_Cleared_Target__c=TODAY(), ISBLANK(WC_Underwriting_Review_Complete__c)&& WC_Underwriting_Review_Target__c=TODAY(), ISBLANK(Complete_Payroll_Shell__c)&& Complete_Payroll_Shell_Target__c=TODAY(), ISBLANK(Benefits_ER_Contribution_Loaded__c)&& Benefits_ER_Contribution_Loaded_Target__c=TODAY(), ISBLANK(Onbrdg_Spsheet_Review_and_EE_Load__c)&& Onbrdg_Spsheet_Review_and_EE_Load_Target__c=TODAY(),
ISBLANK(Onboarding_Open_Date_Confirmd__c)&& Set_to_Pending_Ob_Date_Confirmd_Target__c=TODAY(), ISBLANK(Onboarding_Open__c)&& Onboarding_Open_Target__c=TODAY(),
ISBLANK(Benefit_Enrollment_Close__c) && Benefit_Enrollment_Close_Target__c=TODAY(), ISBLANK(NEP_Close__c) &&NEP_Close_Target__c=TODAY(),
ISBLANK(Onboarding_Complete__c)&&Onboarding_Complete_Target__c=TODAY(), ISBLANK(Final_Medical_Approval_Milestone__c)&&Final_Medical_Approval_Target_Milestone__c=TODAY(), ISBLANK(HRIS_Approved_Pass_to_New_Biz__c) && HRIS_Approved_Target_Pass_to_New_Biz__c=TODAY(), ISBLANK(Prior_Wages_Rcvd__c) && Prior_Wages_Rcvd_Target__c=TODAY(), ISBLANK(EE_Verification_and_QC__c) && EE_Verification_and_QC_Target__c=TODAY(),
ISBLANK(Management_Hold_Removed_Date__c) &&Management_Hold_Target__c=TODAY(), ISBLANK(Ready_to_Process_Payroll2__c) && Ready_to_Process_Payroll_Target__c=TODAY(), ISBLANK(Actual_Payroll_Process__c) && Actual_Payroll_Process_Target__c=TODAY() ) , 1,0)
CustomField.label: Calculate Yellow Onboarding Status
